resources.string: This app was originally created by /u/imanomeletteAMA as a joke in a reddit thread.\nIt spawned into a wholesome app thanks to /u/colnan!

V1: Initial release
V2: Increased size of smiley face, added toast and icon
V3: Increased resolution of smiley face, changed toast message.
V4: Added info button
V5: Added changelog
V6: Fixed version numbers
V7: Fixed changelog
